author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011892

Watch the gameplay trailer for The Lonesome Guild, a top-down single-player Action-RPG all about friendship and connection, published by DON'T NOD and developed by Turin-based Tiny Bull Studios. Coming to Steam, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation 5 in Fall 2025. 

Test your might in intense battles and ambush your enemies with clever combos that grow with your relationships. Build your dream team and fight your way through Etere. 

In The Lonesome Guild, you play as Ghost, a spirit with no memories, in a world consumed by loneliness. As a creeping mist spreads, corrupting all in its path, you must gather a ragtag party of six misfits, each with unique abilities, stories, and struggles. Seamlessly switch between them in battle and exploration, forging bonds that unlock powerful combos and heartfelt moments by the campfire. 

Wishlist now!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: The Lonesome Guild - Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011382

Available now on PS5 and PS4; try the PS5 demo today!

Are you ready for the first Yoyovania?! In this 2D top-down adventure you'll explore a sprawling urban landscape, reinterpreting your surroundings through your mastery of yoyo tricks. Navigate the city's many districts, fight rival crime bosses, and regain the influence of the Pipistrello family!

•Explore the city's 4 districts with over 1000 screens' worth of challenges and secrets!

•Infiltrate the businesses of the 4 crime bosses! Navigate their labyrinthine buildings, take on foes, and solve action puzzles!

•Master over 10 yoyo tricks and Special Moves to create your own yoyo-parkour routes and pulverize your enemies in combat!

•Collect over 40 equippable Badges that alter the way you play!

•Unlock over 20 passive Upgrades through a shady loan shark!

•Find over 80 other collectibles throughout town, from life upgrades to precious treasures!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4gam
title: Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
🏀 Get ready to bounce!

NBA Bounce is the brand-new, family-friendly basketball game designed for little ballers and big fun. With easy-to-learn controls, vibrant visuals, and over-the-top game modes, it's the perfect intro to the world of basketball for kids of all ages.

🔥 Coming soon to: PlayStation 5 & 4.

🎮 GAME FEATURES:

Simplified 3v3 basketball action

Fun Party Mode with wild mini-games

Local co-op for up to 4 players

Custom MVP looks – jerseys, sneakers & more

Hype commentary & crowd energy

Create your own NBA Finals bracket

Tons of unlockables in the Locker Room

Whether you're landing your first slam dunk or teaming up with your mascot for some Party Mode mayhem, NBA Bounce brings the energy of the NBA to your living room.

💥 Perfect for kids, families, and anyone who loves fun, fast-paced sports games!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: NBA Bounce - Announce Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Crystal of Atlan arrives on PlayStation May 28 - Defy fate. Rise beyond destiny.
The highly anticipated Crystal of Atlan offers a tantalizing glimpse into a magicpunk world—packed with epic combos, mesmerizing landscapes, and thrilling quests.
The PlayStation 5 version has been specially optimized with enhanced graphics, DualSense support, a remapped UI, HDR, and PSSR for PS5 Pro. We’ve fine-tuned every detail to deliver the most intense combat, the smoothest exploration, and a Void Realm that feels truly immersive.
Step into the magicpunk world of Atlan, forge unbreakable bonds, and prepare for an unforgettable journey.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Crystal of Atlan - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/monster-hunter-wilds/

Check out this special message from Street Fighter 6 Director Nakayama to welcome the arrival of the Monster Hunter Wilds x Street Fighter 6 Special Collaboration! Be sure to look out for director Nakayama in the Grand Hub during your hunts! 
 
The collaboration including the Akuma armor set, Blanka-chan Palico equipment, and more arrive on May 28!
-------
About Monster Hunter Wilds
Monster Hunter Wilds is the next generation of the acclaimed Monster Hunter series.

You are a monster hunter, protecting the balance of the ecosystem and hunting monsters in a world with dynamic, ever-changing environments. Use the resources you gain from hunts to craft ever more powerful weapons and armor in your quest to unravel the mysteries of the new lands.

Experience the most evolved action and improved immersion in the series in Monster Hunter Wilds, available now on PS5.

#ps5 #ps5games #monsterhunter #monsterhunterwildsgameplay #stre
title: Monster Hunter Wilds x Street Fighter 6 Special Collaboration - A Chat with Director Nakayama | PS5
